About

Hello I am Łukasz Marczak, I graduated AGH Univeristy of Science and Technology at Cracow(Poland).

I worked as Android Developer in different environments: corporation, freelance, startup, or middle-size company. I started my Android journey as Hackaton Bounty-Hunter, developing several apps related to BLE devices and geolocation.
